channel.title: BUIDL IDE on CyberMiles News and Articles

item.title: Issue your own CRC20 token on CyberMiles
item.description: Last week, we introduced an artist who issued his own CRC20 tokens LCT to motivate his community. When the members published their own painting, then the member will receive the LCT token as a reward. The LCT token could be used to exchange the artistâ€™s painting. You can easily issue your CRC20 token with CyberMiles App, if you have at least 1,000 CMT in your CMT address. But if you want to write some code and start from scratch, you can also use BUIDL for CMT to issue your own tokens.
